sourcesContent: // ** Third Party Components import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react/swiper-react' // ** Reactstrap Imports import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' // ** Images import img1 from '@src/assets/images/banner/banner-21.jpg' import img2 from '@src/assets/images/banner/banner-22.jpg' import img3 from '@src/assets/images/banner/banner-23.jpg' import img4 from '@src/assets/images/banner/banner-24.jpg' const params = { effect: 'cube', pagination: { clickable: true }, cubeEffect: { shadow: true, shadowOffset: 20, shadowScale: 0.94, slideShadows: true } } const SwiperThreeD = ({ isRtl }) => { return ( 3D Cube Effect ) } export default SwiperThreeD
